text: Jutal (Urdu, Burushiski, Shina: ) is a village in the district Gilgit at a distance of 25km from Gilgit city. The world's highest paved road KKH passes through the beautiful landscape of the village. In the south of the village is a small settlement formed by migrant families affected during sectarian tension of 1988, is called Jagot colony. ==See also== *Gilgit City *Nomal == References == Category:Populated places in Gilgit District
title: Jutal
